text:

wow
<@U0B9N0HF0> - let me know when you get that data exported. curious if there’s anything interesting in it
Yes—that’s awesome! Marce—please keep me in the loop on the intro. Wine Spectator is obviously a crucial pub.
to the writer or the cellar owner?
i assumed cellar owner
we might need some gold plated caps for his opulent cellar
it’s the cellar owner

attachments.title: Holy Grail of Wine Cellars Found in Memphis |
attachments.text: This Holy Grail of wine cellars is tucked away in Memphis, Tennessee and is one of Revel's best wine cellars yet.
attachments.fallback: Revel Cellars: Holy Grail of Wine Cellars Found in Memphis |

text: assuming he spent north of $150k on just the cellar itself
based on the numbers in that doc.
and his collection is probably a multiplier on that
<@U026NB2U2>: need to be an admin to export, but beside growth line, it only captures emails. I can manually input those into sheet or be made admin

<@U026NB2U2> and <@U0K8ZSHN0> Per our discussion in our Sommely meeting, I’ve created a coverage tracker for Sommely. It’s divided by month and has published stories as well as media conversations (so we can track who we’ve chatted with that didn’t result in coverage). There is also a tab for upcoming/expected coverage so we can track what’s likely coming but hasn’t been published yet.
I also plan on adding a tab for potential media to reach out to. Let me know if you have any questions.
Go for admin! (Ask John)
<http://www.beveragedaily.com/Processing-Packaging/Malibu-celebrates-largest-deployment-of-NFC-enabled-bottles?nocount>

attachments.title: Malibu celebrates largest deployment of NFC enabled bottles
attachments.text: Malibu, which manufactures and sells coconut flavored rum, has launched a smart bottle that delivers content to consumers’ smartphones via NFC (Near Field Communication).
